TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit ListViewItem/ListViewSubItem extends System.Object

span.span: Represents a subitem of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件显示由类定义的项的列表 。A control displays a list of items that are defined by the class. 每个都 可以存储由类定义的子项对象 。Each can store subitem objects that are defined by the class. 将 控件的属性设置为时，将显示子项 。Subitems are displayed when the property of the control is set to . 通常，子项包含与它们的父项相关的信息。Typically, subitems contain information that is related to their parent item. 例如，如果 控件显示表示 orders 的项，则每个项都可以显示订单号。For example, if a control displays items that represent orders, each item could display the order number. 可以将子项添加到每个项以显示信息，如订购的产品数量、订购的商品的数量以及订购的商品的总价。Subitems could be added to each item to display information such as the product ordered, the quantity of items ordered, and the total price of the items ordered. 与对象不同的是 ， 如果 将控件的属性设置为) ，则用户不能直接编辑对象 (用户可以编辑对象 `true` 。Unlike objects, objects cannot be edited directly by the user (the user can edit objects if the property of the control is set to `true`). 由于子项不能由用户直接编辑，并且不显示图像，因此属性被限制为在控件中显示时影响子项文本样式的属性 。Because subitems cannot be directly edited by the user and do not display images, properties are limited to those that affect the style of the subitem text when it is displayed in the control. 如果 包含子项的的属性 设置为 `false` ，则可以使用 、 和 属性更改应用于文本显示的样式。If the property of the that contains the subitems is set to `false`, you can use the , , and properties to change the styles applied to the text display. 通常，项和子项的样式在控件中是相同的 ，但是如果要更改特定的样式 以突出显示它，则可以对要以不同方式显示的项使用这些属性。Typically, the styles of the item and the subitems are the same in a control, but if you want to change the style of a specific to highlight it, you can use these properties on the items you want to display differently. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 控件，其中指定了三个 对象，并 为每个项指定了三个对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 该示例还创建了 用于在详细信息视图中显示子项的对象。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 在代码示例中还创建了两个对象，以便为对象提供图像 。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些 对象将添加到 和 属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性创建 控件。The example uses the following properties in creating the control. - - - - - - - 需要将代码添加到 ，并从构造函数或窗体上的其他方法调用在示例中创建的方法。You need to add the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例要求名为、、和的映像 `MySmallImage1` `MySmallImage2` `MyLargeImage1` `MyLargeImage2` 位于驱动器 C 的根目录中。The example requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置该子项文本的背景色。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color of the subitem's text.
A that represents the background color of the subitem's text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 属性更改子项文本后面显示的颜色。You can use the property to change the color displayed behind the subitem text. 如果要使用不同的背景色和前景色组合 (使用 属性设置前景色) 以便区分某个子项，则可以使用此属性。This property can be used if you want to use different background and foreground color combinations (using the property to set the foreground color) to differentiate one subitem from another. 例如，可以将 属性设置为， 以标识显示负值的子项。For example, you could set the property to to identify subitems that display a negative value. 如果 拥有子项的的属性 设置为 `true` ，则设置此属性不起作用。If the property of the that owns the subitem is set to `true`, setting this property has no effect.

summary.span: 获取或设置子项显示的文本的字体。

span.span: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the subitem.

value.span: 要应用于由控件显示的文本的 。

span.span: The to apply to the text displayed by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此属性更改应用于子项文本的字体样式。You can use this property to change the font styles applied to the text of the subitem. 如果将 的属性 设置为，则 `true` 更改此属性将不起作用。If the property of the is set to `true`, changing this property will have no effect. 因为 是不可变 (这意味着不能) 调整其任何属性，所以只能为 属性分配新的 。Because the is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the property a new . 不过，您可以将新字体基于现有字体。However, you can base the new font on the existing font. 下面的示例演示如何调整现有字体以使其变为粗体：The following is an example of how to adjust the existing font to make it bold: ```csharp listViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font = new Font(listViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font, listViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font.Style | FontStyle.Bold); ``` ```vb ListViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font = New Font(ListViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font, _ ListViewItem1.SubItems[1].Font.Style Or FontStyle.Bold) ``` 如果 拥有子项的的属性 设置为 `true` ，则设置此属性不起作用。If the property of the that owns the subitem is set to `true`, setting this property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性设置 为以 `false` 定义对象的自定义样式 。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to `false` to define a custom style for objects. 该示例演示如何设置 和 属性。The example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `InitializeListView` 在窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法中调用方法。To run the example, paste the following code into a form, and call the `InitializeListView` method in form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the foreground color of the subitem's text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 属性来更改子项文本的颜色。You can use the property to change the color of the subitem text. 如果要使用不同的背景色和前景色组合 (使用 属性设置背景色) 以便区分一项，则可使用此属性。This property can be used if you want to use different background and foreground color combinations (using the property to set the background color) to differentiate one item from another. 例如，可以将 属性设置为， 以标识具有负数关联的项。For example, you could set the property to to identify items that have a negative number associated with them. 如果 拥有子项的的属性 设置为 `true` ，则设置此属性不起作用。If the property of the that owns the subitem is set to `true`, setting this property has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性设置 为以 `false` 定义对象的自定义样式 。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to `false` to define a custom style for objects. 该示例演示如何设置 和 属性。The example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到窗体中，并 `InitializeListView` 在窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法中调用方法。To run the example, paste the following code into a form, and call the `InitializeListView` method in form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将应用于子项的样式重置为默认字体和颜色。

span.span: Resets the styles applied to the subitem to the default font and colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法来重置应用到子项的字体、背景色和前景色设置。You can use this method to reset the font, background color, and foreground color settings applied to the subitem. 重置样式后，将使用默认字体、背景色和前景色设置显示子项。When the styles are reset, the subitem is displayed using the default font, background color, and foreground color settings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何 通过使用 属性和方法来重置的子项的样式 。The following code example demonstrates how to reset the style of the subitems of a through the use of the property and the method. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴到包含名为的按钮的窗体中 `Button1` ，然后 `InitializeListView` 在窗体的构造函数或 事件处理方法中调用方法。To run the example, paste the following code into a form containing a button named `Button1`, and call the `InitializeListView` method in the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItemStyle/VB/form1.vb#2)]
